summary: "A Quiet Place: Day One" is a 2024 American horror movie, the third in the "A Quiet Place" series. It's about an invasion of blind, noise-sensitive aliens in New York City. Lupita Nyong'o stars as a sick woman trying to survive. The film was directed by Michael Sarnoski, who took over from Jeff Nichols. Shooting happened in London in 2023. The movie premiered in June 2024 and has been well-received, making over $261 million globally.
title: A Quiet Place Day One
